com.googlecode.janrain4j.springframework.security
Class JanrainAuthenticationProvider

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.janrain4j.springframework.security.JanrainAuthenticationProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.security.authentication.AuthenticationProvider
public class JanrainAuthenticationProvider
extends Object
implements org.springframework.security.authentication.AuthenticationProvider

Finalizes the Janrain authentication by loading the local user details. The UserDetails are loaded by calling the configured AuthenticationUserDetailsService.

If no AuthenticationUserDetailsService is configured this provider will return a new JanrainUserDetails instance containing the UserDataResponse.

Since:
1.1
Author:
Marcel Overdijk
